channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [WAW][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 12, 04:30 - 07:30 UTC

Jun 6, 08:05 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud.

Start time : 12/06/2024 04:30 UTC
End time : 12/06/2024 07:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are going to update the server to a newer and more stable version.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipment operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 11, 04:00 - 13:00 UTC

May 30, 21:59 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 11/06/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 11/06/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 10, 06:00 UTC  -  Jun 14, 16:00 UTC

Jun 3, 21:29 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 10/06/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 14/06/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for VMware vCenter Server services. An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS/ERI/LIM/SBG/WAW/RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Licensing
item.description:
Jun 6, 16:11 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 24, 13:45 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 24, 13:30 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, new license will be provided soon

Start time : 03/06/2023 07:00 UTC
End time : 30/06/2023 15:00 UTC
Service impact : We are in the process of renewing the Veeam licensing, , but due to some issues, we entered into a Grace Period.
You may experience some issues to get new licenses from our Veeam Enterprise offer and messages speaking about Grace Period.
This isn't impacting our Managed Veeam Backup offer.
Service improvement : We are working the renewal with our partner, we expect to receive the new license in the following days.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Storage incident notification
item.description:
May 19, 15:06 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 19/05/2024 11:55 UTC
End Time : 19/05/2024 14:57 UTC
User impact : Backup and restore services for customers on storage server149 were temporarily unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b
Root cause :Electrical issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 19, 13:35 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 19/05/2024 11:55 UTC
User impact : Backup and restore services for customers on storage server149 are temporarily unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : rbx2b
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
